EmailTemplate.description: New DCR created email to Aviation Services
EmailTemplate.name: AT DCR Setup for AVS
EmailTemplate.subject: DCR [ident] [data supplier] [AC type] [cycle date] [Country] [Customer name]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Aviation Services,
I've just created DCR [IDENT]. Please enter the FMS part number into CorePT on the attached. Please let me know once it is entered so I can complete the setup in BMS.
Attached is the customer's selection form and customer profile with contact information. Please reach out to the customer with any questions or concerns regarding the contents.
Please confirm to the customer whether or not you will be able to accommodate their requested start date (on subscriber profile).
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Account Management Representative
602-436-6739
Fax: 602-822-7333
email: AISACCOUNTSERVICES@HONEYWELL.COM
